message.body: Oh wow, this thing paired us up again. How's it going?
I guess there aren't too many participants:-)
What's your gave song to play on guitar?
Don't worry, they'll have to pair u up with someone new over the next 7 days cuz i'm leaving for the Dominican Republic tonight
Any fun plans for the Memorial Day weekend?
It's still all tentative. I might go to Lake Tahoe for some adventure sports. Do they have anything like that in AZ?
(1/2)None yet lol. I'm a beginner. I've been practicing it for about 3 months or so. Right now, I'm just familiarizing myself with various scales and chords.
(2/2)Haven't reached the part where I play songs. Do you play any instruments yourself?
Yes, AZ is full of outdoor opportunities: we've got a number of lakes, incl Lake Powell for scenery & Lake Havarti for fun + water sports; many canyons (
of course the Grand Canyon); Sedona has gorgeous red rocks, skiing at 2 diff resorts
No instruments now but I played sax for 6 years in high school
I'm off to the Dominican. Nice chatting with u!!
Don't work too hard! Happy Memorial Day!
Have a great trip! A Happy Memorial Day to you too!
